branchCategory.name: ISE75H, Digital High Pressure Sensor, 1 Screen, 1 or 2 Output, IP67
branchCategory.description: <p>ISE75H is a 15MPa digital pressure sensor with a 3 digit, 2 color display.  Instant readings are shown in red or green, or shifted from one to the other to alert reaching a target condition.  Switch OUT1 is also indicated on the display.  Additional functions enhance security, power saving, resolution and stability.  Error function reports 9 errors to help restore functionality.  Aluminum body and steel piping lug provide durability.  Smooth panel with membrane buttons improves hygiene.  ISE75H is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP67 enclosure rating.</p>

breadCrumb.name: ISE75H, Digital High Pressure Sensor, 1 Screen, 1 or 2 Output, IP67
